# AVAudioUnitVarispeed

**Class**

An object that allows control of the playback rate.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVAudioUnitVarispeed
```

## Getting and setting the playback rate

- **rate**: The audio playback rate.

## Time effects

- **AVAudioUnitTimeEffect**: An object that processes audio in nonreal time.
- **AVAudioUnitTimePitch**: An object that provides a good-quality playback rate and pitch shifting independently of each other.

## Inherits From

- AVAudioUnitTimeEffect

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
